data.name: Taboo Tattoo: The Deciding Battle
data.short_description: Izzy and the others race through the ruins... and find Justice skewered on a bed of spikes. Worse yet, his overuse of his tattoo powers has weakened his regenerative ability, leaving him on the verge of death. Izzy and Tamaki tell Tom to take him and flee while they face off against Arya...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Taboo Tattoo: The Deciding Battle
